author: m.kalinin
content: if multiple 32ETH validators are slashed initial slashing penalty will be the same as if those validators were consolidated. There is an increased slashing risk for consolidated validator vs non-consolidation but after some number of keys run by the same node the risk becomes the same, i.e. consolidating up to a certain extent does not lead to an increased slashing risk. More on this: https://hackmd.io/@dapplion/maxeb_slashing_risks, https://hackmd.io/@5wamg-wlRCCzGh0aoCqR0w/r1aYbH8x0
